channel.title: Making words censored?

item.title: Making words censored?
item.dc:creator: @compile_easy compile easy
item.description:
@compile_easy wrote:

make (".com" , “CENSORED”); and replace “.com” with any cuss word and such and such :[)

Read full topic

item.title: Making words censored?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

I know for commands like yell you can do this

command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "CENSORED"); command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "CENSORED"); command.substring(5).replaceAll(".biz", "CENSORED"); command.substring(5).replaceAll(".org", "CENSORED"); command.substring(5).replaceAll(".info", "CENSORED"); command.substring(5).replaceAll(".com", "CENSORED"); command.substring(5).trim();
but how do you make it so they can’t say any of that in just regular chat?

Read full topic
